functions.tag:
{author:"Author Unknown",title:"Underneath",resolved:1b,pages:["


Deep down,
Beneath the ground,
A city lies in wait.
Full of life,
But humans not,
The living dead do creep.","



The beasts parade,
And the dead decay,
And he does watch,
From within said dark.","



The city of the bridge,
The great unknown,
Here the future rises,
And so too does it fall."]}
